entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
